long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an unofficial extension that puts back the Spotify Lyrics!

NOTE: This extension uses free resources and can be unavailable for a while when You first open Spotify. Yeah yeah, its kinda sad, but this is a simple extension made for myself
